title: rugpull claim
body:
deposited 6000 DAi with 0 day lock on helios.cash, they seem to have a back to lock up my deposit for 15 days. and on the 7th day, they claim to attack by hacker and the other day, they shut down the website and rug all the money, the price of the token $heo drop 99.99%.

wallet address: 0x7F85Cf44E446a4B1AaCe2A28774E88cd6d4e3441

project address: helios.cash

contract:0x03aa5daf9fd5f7f33c67afbcd53c1c1e87c4c9f7

rugpull address: 0x8eB6eAD701b7d378cF62C898a0A7b72639a89201

Deposited 6000 Dai on helios.cash and the TX is:
https://polygonscan.com/tx/0xede87a9d983d6a428df8ab8a85c49673464a11f03ea3d8d23c8bf30f02ae7ee5

Price on coingecko:
https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/helios-cash
author: 0x7F85Cf44E446a4B1AaCe2A28774E88cd6d4e3441
